participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and slightly sarcastic, often looking for the humor in situations.
participant_1.background: A recent graduate with a passion for science and technology, Alex enjoys exploring new ideas and making connections with others.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Intelligent and somewhat self-deprecating, with a strong sense of humor and a hint of pride in his accomplishments.
participant_2.background: With an impressive academic career and experience in engineering, Jordan balances professional life with being a dedicated parent.

content.text: S.H.I.E.L.D. academy, top of your class, two PHDs in very advanced fields.
The I.M.T., the international monkey... interschool multidiscipline tournament.
do you work there or own it?
Well, FYI, I am also an engineer with a degree from Berkeley who's not only created my share of code,  but given birth to two real humans.  Oh, God.
Oh. Which I think you will excel at.
